summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingHSA/FSA eligibleClinique Acne Solutions Clarifying Face Lotion is a gentle, medicated liquid exfoliator. Reduces excess oil and shine, mattifies skin, and unclogs pores.
details: DetailsBenefitsFormulated for acne-prone skins.Liquid face exfoliator powered by salicylic acid helps keep skin clearer and controls shine.Exfoliating ingredients sweep away dead surface cells and reduce excess oil that can lead to breakouts.Oil-absorbing powders help reduce shine.Leaves skin feeling clean and fresh.Dermatologist tested.For best results, use the Clinique Acne Solutions Clear Skin System consistently to help get breakouts under control: cleanse with Cleansing Foam or Cleansing Gel, exfoliate with Clarifying Lotion, and treat with Clinical Clearing Gel.Non-acnegenic.Allergy tested.Key IngredientsSalicylic acid and acetyl glucosamine help clear dead skin cells that can contribute to clogged pores.Silica absorbs excess oil to give skin a matte look.Formulated WithoutParabensPhthalatesOilSynthetic colorsSLSSLESGlutenFragranceItem 2153868How To UseUse lotion twice a day, morning and night.Shake well. Apply with a cotton ball, sweeping gently over face and neck.For external use only. Avoid eye area and lips.Follow with a lightweight, oil-free hydrator like Dramatically Different Oil-Free Gel.IngredientsActive: 2.0% Salicylic Acid. Inactive: Water / Aqua / Eau, Alcohol Denat., Nylon-12, Butylene Glycol, Hamamelis Virginiana (Witch Hazel), Laminaria Saccharina Extract, Caffeine, Sucrose, Glycerin, Acetyl Glucosamine, Sorbitol, Sea Whip Extract, Barium Sulfate, 10-Hydroxydecanoic Acid, Silica, Disodium EDTA, Benzalkonium Chloride.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details

reviews.headline: My absolute fav!
reviews.comments: I love this so much. I have been using it for soo long and still does wonders for my skin. I highly recommend this!!!

reviews.headline: Chemical burn :(
reviews.comments:
okay so i've been offically using this 3 step acne line for almost a month now. The toner really burns me i don't know how else to incorporate it into my skin care routine. i usually wash my face in the shower with the foaming cleanser from this line, then i take a cotton ball and very lightly swipe scross my face with the exfoliater. It finally got so bad my forhead turned red and swollen and was VERY tight i started to cry a lot. 

yes i did start off with the toner every other day/week because it was 2 strong for me personally but i haven't been using it on my forhead at all anymore i am traumatized. I think it "works" but harshly very harsh. My acne is getting better but its like in exchange for no more acne i am getting so much texture all over my face that i did not have before. Various little white bumps are spreading all over my chin/mouth area i am honestly so defeated. I am gonna try to use the rest of these products because they were expensive to buy all together at full size. I recommend these ONLY if you are okay with purging a lot before it gets better :(

reviews.headline: Yes yes yes!!
reviews.comments:
I absolutely love this product. I've been using it for over two years now and since I have started it have had almost NO acne. I ran out of it a few months ago and didn't use it for about two weeks, and my acne got so bad. I picked it up again at Ulta and oh my gosh it cleared so fast.
Pros: clears acne super quickly, removes makeup pretty well, prevents acne and clears pores and blackheads
Cons: it does dry out my skin but I don't find it to be a huge problem for me personally because I just apply moisturizer after using. It's also kind of expensive but it's Clinique and imo it's so worth it

I DEFINITELY recommend this!!

reviews.headline: Nothing else was helping my hormonal acne!
reviews.comments:
I tried everything for my hormonal acne, including prescription creams.

Within days after using this twice daily, i started to see a change in my skin. For roughly a year or so prior, I was dealing with consistent breakouts.

I hardly write reviews but highly texommend for those struggling with hormonal acne.

reviews.headline: Will definitely purchase again
reviews.comments: I really like this toner, it's not harsh on your skin but definitely brightens it

reviews.headline: I will buy it again.
reviews.comments: Since I had this product recommended to me I have been using it and provides very good results on my skin.

reviews.headline: Highly recommend
reviews.comments: So i ordered this product online without reading the description. I was expecting an actual LOTION not liquid. However, since it was pricey and im desperate to relieve my acne,  i decided to try it. Id definitely call this more of a "toner" bc you apply with a cotton ball and its a bottle of liquid.  I will say that it makes my skin feel soooo soft and is not overdrying. I was looking for an acne treatment moisturizing lotion, but i am surprised and delighted with the benefits. I have used it twice already on my skin and neck and my skin feels soooo soft and smooth and its definitely shrinking the blemishes i have. Although i was initially disaapointed its not a "lotion" i am pleased with the effectiveness and will more than likely purchase again. Once it dries on your skin, id recommend throwing a moisturizer on top to prevent excess drying out.

reviews.headline: Texture noticeably better
reviews.comments: Greatly improved my skin texture. A little pricey but for sure worth it.

reviews.headline: 45 with acne
reviews.comments: Really controls acne breakout, I wear makeup 5 days out the week which in sure clog pores. I haven't had any breakouts since buying this product, I'm highly pleased. I use it once a week on my 12yr old because it is strong, but she have regular ance for someone facing puberty. I use this product 3x a week myself.

reviews.headline: Love this
reviews.comments: I've been using this for over 10 years and i'll never use anything else. Makes my skin feel clean and it really works well for me. I use this along with the treatment gel and face wash. Absolutely love it

reviews.headline: Better than Paul's Choice Toner
reviews.comments: I have been using this clarifying lotion twice a day along with the Acne Clearing Gel for spot treatments and it has worked miracles for my adult acne prone skin. Better than Paula's Choice toner!

reviews.headline: I use this ALL the time and won't use anything else.
reviews.comments: I love Clinique products and have used them for many years.  I will not use anything else.

reviews.headline: The best for breakouts
reviews.comments: Use it on the outer edges of my face after cleaning and before using moisturizer at night and it is wonderful.

reviews.headline: Great!
reviews.comments: The Clinique Acne system along with this clarifying lotion is amazing! I was leary because it was so thin but it works great!

reviews.headline: This helps
reviews.comments: This helped my skin so much. Doesn't leave my face feeling dry & itchy. Because I have sensitive skin, I only use it once a day.

reviews.headline: if you can get past the alcohol smell… it's good
reviews.comments: This product definitely does the job. i'm not someone with acne prone skin but with my occasional breakouts, applying this "lotion" really helps. The only con is the horrendous smell of rubbing alcohol.

reviews.headline: Love!!
reviews.comments: Best acne product

reviews.headline: Works
reviews.comments: Bought this for my 15-year-old grandson. Only using at night seems to have helped greatly in such a short period of time.

reviews.headline: I have use this for years and love it
reviews.comments: I use it in the morning, it works while not drying out my skin

reviews.headline: Jon Drying
reviews.comments: Have been using for years. I have sensitive skin. Not harsh.

media.headline: Broke my skin
media.caption: I take this pic when i stopped using

faceoff_positive.comments:
I just finished my first bottle of this toner, and am now on my 2nd bottle! 
A little bit about myself...For as long as I can remember, I've always loved trying new beauty products. From foundation, to hair serums, to body washes, I love trying new things!
I've also suffered from acne for as long as I can remember. I've had cystic acne for over 20 years (I'm 35 years old now). I've seen at least 5 different dermatologists and have tried everything from Accutane, to lotions and creams, to expensive laser treatments at my doctor's office. I seriously felt like I had tried everything, and just wanted to give up and accept the fact that I'd have adult acne for the rest of my life.
Then one day, I was browsing the internet and came across this product. Since I had never tried it before, I thought I'd give it a try.
My daily routine consists of washing my face with a sonic cleansing brush in the morning with a mild cleanser (the Clinique Foaming Sonic Facial Soap). Then, after I wash my face, I apply this toner with a cotton pad. I follow that step with my Clinique Moisture Surge Moisturizer. Then, I apply all of my makeup.
I follow the same steps at night before bed, removing all of the makeup on my face. I like the fact that this toner helps snag any leftover makeup that my cleanser/brush might've missed (like around the ear and chin areas).
My face is the clearest it's been in close to 20+ years....seriously. I don't think I've ever written a product review online, but I've been so incredibly happy with the results I received from this, I just HAD to share my story with anyone who was considering purchasing this product and may be on the fence. Please - just give it a try and see for yourself. I'm pretty sure you'll be just as happy as I am with the results!
faceoff_positive.headline: I'm on my 2nd bottle!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I am not one to normally write reviews but I feel inclined to save anyone else out there thinking of adding this to their anti-acne routine. I have used the Clinique Clinical Clearing gel for years and love it! I still get hormonal breakouts on my chin though and thought this would help if I added it along with the clearing gel. I'm so glad I only used this on a patch of my skin at first. 

I dabbed a soaked cotton ball of this on the one big pimple I had for a few days..I felt like it worked to keep the head at bay. But then over the course of the next few days that area of my chin broke out SO bad. I'm not talking little white heads either...big painful, red bumps that take days to calm down. Maybe it was purging as I've read about that before...but the painful, extremely red line of pimples was too much for me to take. My skin has never looked so bad, I wanted to go into hiding.

It seems this product does work for a lot of people, but definitely not for me. My advice if you really want to try is to only do a SMALL patch of skin for the first few weeks :(
faceoff_negative.headline: Made me break out terribly
